An enquiry into the new opinions, chiefly propagated by the Presbyterians of Scotland together with some animadversions on a late book, entitled, A defence of The vindication of the kirk : in a letter to a friend at Edinburgh / by A.M., D.D. Monro, Alexander, d. 1715?
[12], 339, [1] p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby, London : 1696.
Attributed to Alexander Monro. Cf. BM. Errata: p. [11] Advertisement on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

Printed for Walter Kettilby, London : 1696.
